      • connectGameApp

        public int connectGameApp(de.tud.kom.socom.util.SocomRequest req)
                   throws de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.IllegalParameterException,
                          de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException,
                          java.sql.SQLException
        Connect a socialnetwork application to a socom-game
        Parameters:
        network -
        game - name of the game
        password - games password
        app_id - socialnetwork specific application id
        app_secret - socielnetwork specific application secret
        autofill_redirects - optional (default true): if true the token_redirect_url and general_redirect_url are filled auto automatically which may cause unusability when different token-request methods are used
        token_redirect_url - optional (only when autofill_.. is false) default: http:///servlet/social/requestToken
        general_redirect_url - optional (only when autofill_.. is false) default: http:///web
        Returns:
        success json
        Throws:
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.IllegalParameterException
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • publishMediaOnFeed

        public int publishMediaOnFeed(de.tud.kom.socom.util.SocomRequest req)
                       throws org.json.JSONException,
                              de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException,
                              java.sql.SQLException
        POST-Method Publish media-based content on users walls. All Parameters must be given as cookies. Furthermore the HTTP-POST must include a stream containing the file which should be uploaded
        Parameters:
        message -
        type - (photos/videos)
        extension - The file's extension
        publishonpage - whether the post should be done on the games page instead of users feed (see connectGamePage in UserManager)
        Returns:
        Post-Ids
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.sql.SQLException
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException
